title.profile: Profile | Edit Your Profile and Add To Do

meta.description: Free and Open Source TypeScript Full Stack Mean To Do Starter App

HOME_PAGE.angular: Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.
HOME_PAGE.express: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
HOME_PAGE.main_description: This TypeScript based M.E.A.N project uses Server Side Rendering (SSR) that allow to load pages faster and make your web application seo-friendly. Passport.js (JWT and Local) is used to manage users. Users can edit their personal infos and set profile image. Clouninary preferred to store images. Also this application inlude simple to do app in profile page.
HOME_PAGE.main_submain_description: With this  you can make fast startup on your next Full-Stack M.E.A.N application. For docs and source code
HOME_PAGE.mongodb: MongoDB is a general purpose, document-based, distributed database built for modern application developers and for the cloud era.
HOME_PAGE.node: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript run-time environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a browser.
